import React from "react" import Card from "./shared/Card" import {FaTimes} from 'react-icons/fa' import second from 'first' import { useContext } from "react" import { FeedbackContext } from "./FeedbackContext" function Rating({info}){ const {handledelete} = useContext(FeedbackContext) return (
{info.rating}
{info.text}
 ) } export default Rating
